questoes.pergunta: Choose the correct word to complete the sentence: "She ___ the letter before she left."
questoes.explicacao: Past perfect expresses an action completed before another past action.

questoes.pergunta: Select the best synonym for the word “beneficial”.
questoes.explicacao: Beneficial means useful or advantageous.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the correct option: "If I ___ enough money, I would travel abroad."
questoes.explicacao: Second conditional uses past form after if.

questoes.pergunta: Which sentence is written in the passive voice?
opcoes: Yesterday, they are writing the report.
questoes.explicacao: Passive places the object of an action as the subject.

questoes.pergunta: Complete the sentence: "Despite ___ so hard, he failed the test."
questoes.explicacao: After 'despite' use gerund – studying.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the correct preposition: "He is interested ___ learning languages."
questoes.explicacao: Interest + in + verb-ing.

questoes.pergunta:
Which option best completes the dialogue: “A: Are you coming to the party?
B: ___”
questoes.explicacao: Present continuous is used for future arrangements.

questoes.pergunta: Select the word that is opposite in meaning to “scarce”.
questoes.explicacao: Scarce means not enough; opposite is plentiful.

questoes.pergunta: Which sentence is grammatically correct?
opcoes: None of the books is interesting.
questoes.explicacao: None can take singular verb depending on meaning.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the right option: “He said he ___ come earlier.”
questoes.explicacao: Reported speech uses ‘would’ for 'will'.

questoes.pergunta: Which sentence shows a correct use of a phrasal verb?
opcoes: We ran out the finish line.
questoes.explicacao: Look after means take care of.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the correct word to complete: "They ___ to the park every Sunday."
questoes.explicacao: Habitual action uses simple present.

questoes.pergunta: Select the best answer: "If she ___ earlier, she wouldn’t have missed the bus."
questoes.explicacao: Third conditional uses past perfect.

questoes.pergunta: Which is a correct relative pronoun to fill: "The man ___ car was stolen is here."
questoes.explicacao: Possessive relative pronoun is whose.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the correct form: “I wish I ___ more time.”
questoes.explicacao: Wish uses past form for unreal present wishes.

questoes.pergunta: Select the best word: "Her explanation was quite ___ and clear."
questoes.explicacao: Lucid means clear and easy to understand.

questoes.pergunta: Which tense is used for an action happening now?
questoes.explicacao: Present continuous for current ongoing actions.

questoes.pergunta: Choose the best option: "No sooner ___ than she left."
questoes.explicacao: Inversion after no sooner.

questoes.pergunta: Select the antonym of “scarcity”.
questoes.explicacao: Scarcity opposite is overabundance.

questoes.pergunta: Which sentence is correct?
opcoes: She suggested that to go early.
questoes.explicacao: Suggest + gerund.
